scripts.db:push: dotenv -e ../../.env -- bun run --bun prisma db push
scripts.db:migrate: dotenv -e ../../.env -- sh -c 'DATABASE_URL="$DATABASE_URL_MIGRATE" bun run --bun prisma migrate dev'
scripts.db:migrate:reset: dotenv -e ../../.env -- sh -c 'DATABASE_URL="$DATABASE_URL_MIGRATE" bun run --bun prisma migrate reset'
scripts.db:migrate:deploy: dotenv -e ../../.env -- sh -c 'DATABASE_URL="$DATABASE_URL_MIGRATE" bun run --bun prisma migrate deploy'
